New Records: David Warner is close to breaking Adam Gilchrist's World Cup run record; South Africa's middle order has the highest average and run-rate over the last four years in ODIs
Key Match Events: The match is the sixth between Australia and South Africa in a month, highlighting high stakes; Australia's recent struggles contrast with South Africa's form
Pre-Game Insights: Australia's need to avoid batting collapses; South Africa's focus on improving powerplay bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: New pitch and weather conditions in Lucknow affecting the match
